summary: The bill, titled the Small Business Investor Tax Parity Act of 2025, amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction under section 199A for qualified BDC (Business Development Company) interest dividends, treating them similarly to qualified REIT (Real Estate Investment Trust) dividends. The bill defines "qualified BDC interest dividend" and specifies that it applies to electing business development companies. The amendments take effect for taxable years starting after December 31, 2026.
